info.summary: Fast, modern and advanced photo management suite
info.description:
# Memories: Photo Management for Nextcloud
Memories is a *batteries-included* photo management solution for Nextcloud with advanced features including:
- **📸 Timeline**: Sort photos and videos by date taken, parsed from Exif data. - **⏪ Rewind**: Jump to any time in the past instantly and relive your memories. - **🤖 AI Tagging**: Group photos by people and objects, powered by [recognize](https://github.com/nextcloud/recognize) and [facerecognition](https://github.com/matiasdelellis/facerecognition). - **🖼️ Albums**: Create albums to group photos and videos together. Then share these albums with others. - **🫱🏻‍🫲🏻 External Sharing**: Share photos and videos with people outside of your Nextcloud instance. - **📱 Mobile Support**: Work from any device, of any shape and size through the web app. - **✏️ Edit Metadata**: Edit dates and other metadata on photos quickly and in bulk. - **📦 Archive**: Store photos you don't want to see in your timeline in a separate folder. - **📹 Video Transcoding**: Transcode videos and use HLS for maximal performance. - **🗺️ Map**: View your photos on a map, tagged with accurate reverse geocoding. - **🧳 Trips (Beta)**: Automatically detect trips from your photos and create beautiful highlight videos. - **📦 Migration**: Migrate easily from Nextcloud Photos and Google Takeout. - **⚡️ Performance**: Do all this very fast.
## 🚀 Installation
1. Install the app from the Nextcloud app store (try a demo [here](https://demo.memories.gallery/apps/memories/)). 1. Perform the recommended [configuration steps](https://memories.gallery/config/). 1. Run `php occ memories:index` to generate metadata indices for existing photos. 1. Open the 📷 Memories app in Nextcloud and set the directory containing your photos.
## 🧳 Trips Feature (Beta)
Memories automatically detects trips from your photos based on time and location data. To use this feature:
1. Run `php occ memories:trips:direct-detect --user <username>` to detect trips for a specific user. 2. Generate highlight videos with `php occ memories:trips:generate-video <username> --trip-id <id>`. 3. View your trips in the Trips tab and enjoy the automatically generated highlight videos.
**Note**: The trip detection feature is currently in beta. The clustering algorithms (TimeGap and HDBSCAN) are still being refined and may benefit from expert attention to improve accuracy. Results may vary depending on your photo collection's metadata quality and distribution patterns.
